katas.title: String repeat
katas.description: Write a function called repeatStr which repeats the given string string exactly n times.

katas.title: Convert a string to an array
katas.description: Write a function to split a string and convert it into an array of words. For example:
examples: I love arrays they are my favorite ==> [I, love, arrays, they, are, my, favorite]

input: I love arrays they are my favorite

katas.title: Max and min
katas.description: Write a function called maxMin that finds the max and min numbers in an array of numbers, and return and array with both numbers
